## Client.pauseRemoteChanges() method

`pauseRemoteChanges` pauses the synchronization of remote changes, allowing only local changes to be applied.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
pauseRemoteChanges(doc: Document<unknown>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  doc | Document&lt;unknown&gt; |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
